refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a X.509v3 certificate using client's public key

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function creates a X.509v3 certificate from a public key and sign the certificate with CA private key

refsect2.title: ca_key_name
refsect2.para: The name of CA key, the key must have corresponding certificate.

refsect2.title: public_key_name
refsect2.para: The name of the public key used to create certificate, it is given by certificate owner to CA. Note that public key must be imported already in CA'a key space.

refsect2.title: subject
refsect2.para: An array of name/value pairs representing the subject aka name enties

refsect2.title: extensions
refsect2.para: An array of name/value pairs to add as X.509v3 extensions to certificate

refsect2.title: hours
refsect2.para: If specified it is added to the days which allows a more fine-grained control over the expiration date.
